representation_information.name: AMR-WB+, Extended Adaptive Multi-Rate - Wideband Speech Codec
representation_information.description: Audio data compression scheme optimized for speech coding in GSM (Global System for Mobile Communications) and UMTS (Universal Mobile Telecommunications System). AMR-WB+ is backward compatibile with AMR-WB.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
